CustomField.formula: CASE(TEXT(StageName), "Identify Prospects", "Open", "Establish Rapport", "Open", "Qualify Opportunity", "Open", "Select Product(s) and Update Stage", "Open", "Develop Solution/ Proposal", "Open", "Present Solution/ Proposal", "Open", "Re-affirm Value/ Negotiate", "Open", "Awaiting Bookings", "Open", "Closed Won", "Closed Won", "Closed Lost", "Closed Lost", "Err: Invalid stage name" )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Field to allow reporting on Win/ Lost vs Open. Do not display on page layouts.
CustomField.label: Status
